name: 炸鸡块与天使
description:
"Fried Chicken Nuggets and Angels" is a text based adventure game with the theme of a detective story.
The story takes place in a fictional Japanese town of S City. The killer "Rooster" who killed six innocent girls has committed a new crime.
Fortunately, at the scene of the seventh homicide, the police found important clues pointing to the murderer...

Game Play

・Explore and collect clues on the map, rummaging through boxes and cabinets like a traditional Japanese RPG
・Show the right clues to the right characters to get new clues
・After collecting enough clues, it will enter the reasoning mode
・In reasoning mode, you need to make the right choice and find the key words
・There are 3 endings in this game.

Main Characters



Ren Saionji
An elite detective from the First Investigation Section of the Metropolitan Police Department.
Has the special ability to talk to the dead.


Sakura Amamiya
A rookie who has just passed the criminal police assessment,
Silently fell in love with Ren.


Sera
A mysterious girl who calls herself Seraph.
